price: (105) And do not be like the ones who became divided and differed after the clear proofs had come to them. And those will have a great punishment
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ تَفَرَّقُواْ وَٱخۡتَلَفُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتُۚ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walā takūnū ka-alladhīna tafarraqū wa-ikh'talafū min baʿdi mā jāahumu al-bayinātu wa-ulāika lahum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
